title: [GAMEPLAY] Dark Crystal Ryze skin not working properly
body:
{{champion:13}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:12}} 
**I Have noticed something about my recently bought Ryze Skin that is sorta bothering me!**

I am not getting the animations I should be getting. Such as not having the spell icons the skin comes with!
This is a link to screenshots i took of me In game with the skin and how The animations for the spells are not
working properly.
**Click **_[here](http://imgur.com/agNsotg)_** to see what animations Im getting in game**

Now you may think it look's okay but here is where the bug is. The Spells are not suppose to look like that on the skin, here's a link to a video of how the spell should look like. Click **[here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a8Ruf3lxpKM)** for the link.

Please fix this bug, I feel like the ability effects should be there for how much it was worth!

replies.body:
Hey Filmzzy,

The video you're referencing is an old video that features Ryze before his update. [This](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=isSxsJGK-uI) is the updated video SkinSpotlights had made for Dark Crystal Ryze. In addition to the spells being updated, the skill icons were also changed during his update. 

Hope this clarifies things! ^-^

Well the icons were obviously changed due to the update,

But Dark Crystal Ryze used to have his own special effects. That champion spotlight only shows Dark Crystal Ryze with new Base Ryze effects.

Are you saying with the Ryze update you didn't bother to update Dark Crytal's effects and just gave him the base ones?

Shouldn't that lower his price to 750?
DC Ryze has always had the same particle effects as default (believe this is the case for every Ryze skin?). Even your own link shows comments from a year ago+ of people discussing that fact.
Dc ryze used to have very different particles! its why I bought it! now it has boring normal ones! at least make them red!

I dind't post any links...

Anyway, I rememberd other effects for old base Ryze than the ones showed in that spotlight (simpler lightning and less red for example), seems my memory is faulty though.
Sorry, it was supposed to be a comment to OP not you. :)
